Smart Pencil Sharpener: A pencil sharpener that uses artificial intelligence to detect the perfect sharpness for each type of pencil and adjust thete accordingly.
Portable Pencil Sharpener: A compact and portable pencil sharpener that can be taken on-the-go, perfect for students and professionals who need to stay sharp on the move.
Solar-Powered Pencil Sharpener: A pencil sharpener that uses solar power to chargeoterte, making it an eco-friendly and sustainable option.

Augmented Reality Pencil Sharpener: A pencil sharpener that uses augmented reality technology to provide real-time feedback on the sharpness of the pencil, allowing users to make adjustments as needed.
Pencil Sharpener with Customizable Designs: A pencil sharpener that allows users to customize the design of theoterte, making it a unique and personalized option.
